1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: All Summer Long follows a 6 member sketch comedy team as the travel to summer camps across the US performing, serving, and mentoring young people.

locations: Alpine Camp and Conference Center Blue Jay, California, USA::(Summer camp location)
imdb.plot outline: All Summer Long follows 6 college age men and women who are selected to be "The Underclassmen" through a rigorous application process designed to test their spiritual, emotional, and comedic mettle. After a two-week boot camp during which they develop together as missionaries and performers, "The Underclassmen" embark on the ultimate road trip, spending each week at a different camp, performing, counseling, and serving.
imdb.title: All Summer Long
plot: A sketch comedy team travel to summer camps across the US performing, serving, and mentoring young people.::Ed Portillo

_All Summer Long_ (qv) follows 6 college age men and women who are selected to be "The Underclassmen" through a rigorous application process designed to test their spiritual, emotional, and comedic mettle. After a two-week boot camp during which they develop together as missionaries and performers, "The Underclassmen" embark on the ultimate road trip, spending each week at a different camp, performing, counseling, and serving.::Ed Portillo
